先.definition: beforehand; first; earlier; at first; originally; for the time being; for now; (prefix) my late (in referring to deceased relatives older than oneself)

先下手為強.definition: (idiom) strike first to gain the upper hand

先不先.definition: (dialect) first of all; in the first place

先來後到.definition: (idiom) in order of arrival; first come, first served

先入為主.definition: (idiom) the first impression is the strongest; to hold a preconceived notion (about sth)

先兵後禮.definition: opposite of 先禮後兵|先礼后兵[xian1 li3 hou4 bing1]

先君.definition: my late father; my ancestors; the late emperor

先哲.definition: the wise and learned individuals of the past

先天.definition: embryonic period (contrasted with 後天|后天[hou4tian1]); inborn; innate; natural

先天下之憂而憂，後天下之樂而樂.pinyin: xian1 tian1 xia4 zhi1 you1 er2 you1 , hou4 tian1 xia4 zhi1 le4 er2 le4
先天下之憂而憂，後天下之樂而樂.definition: to be the first to worry about affairs of state, and the last to enjoy oneself (quotation from the essay On Yueyang Tower 岳陽樓記|岳阳楼记[Yue4yang2 Lou2 Ji4] by Song writer Fan Zhongyan 范仲淹[Fan4 Zhong4yan1])

先天不足.definition: to suffer from a congenital deficiency; to have an inherent weakness

先天不足，後天失調.pinyin: xian1 tian1 bu4 zu2 , hou4 tian1 shi1 tiao2
先天不足，後天失調.definition: to be born with a weak constitution and suffer from ill health during one's life; (fig.) to be problematic from the start, and get even worse over time

先容.definition: to introduce sb, putting in a good word for them in advance

先導.definition: to lead the way; guide; forerunner; pioneer

先帝遺詔.definition: posthumous edict of a former emperor; Liu Bei's 劉備|刘备[Liu2 Bei4] edict to posterity

先後.definition: early or late; first and last; priority; in succession; one after another

先斬後奏.definition: lit. first execute the criminal, then report it to the emperor (idiom); fig. to take some drastic action without the prior approval of higher authorities

先期.definition: the time before a certain date; in advance; beforehand; premature; initial period

先期錄音.definition: (filmmaking) to prerecord a musical soundtrack to which actors will later synchronize their performance during filming

先決問題.definition: issue that needs to be addressed first (before another issue can be resolved)

先漢.definition: Western Han dynasty (206 BC-8 AD), aka 西漢|西汉[Xi1 Han4]

先生.definition: teacher; gentleman; sir; mister (Mr.); husband; (dialect) doctor; CL:位[wei4]

先發.definition: to take preemptive action; (sports) to be in the starting lineup; (of a baseball pitcher) to be the starting pitcher

先發制人.definition: (idiom) to gain the initiative by striking first; to preempt

先睹為快.definition: (idiom) to consider it a pleasure to be among the first to read (or watch or enjoy)

先知.definition: a person of foresight; (religion) a prophet

先知先覺.definition: having foresight; a person of foresight

先禮後兵.definition: lit. peaceful measures before using force (idiom); fig. diplomacy before violence; jaw-jaw is better than war-war

先秦.definition: pre-Qin, Chinese history up to the foundation of the Qin imperial dynasty in 221 BC

先聲奪人.definition: to gain the upper hand by a show of strength

先行.definition: to start off before the others; to precede; to proceed in advance

先走一步.definition: to leave first (courteous expression used to excuse oneself); (euphemism) to predecease; to die first (e.g. before one's spouse)

先進.definition: sophisticated; advanced (technology etc); meritorious; exemplary (deeds etc)

先進先出.definition: (computing, inventory management etc) first in, first out

先鞭.definition: to be the first; to lead the way

先頭.definition: (usu. of troops) in advance; in the vanguard; previously; in front; placed ahead of others
